name: tau
caption: Lead time
message: The lead time must be positive.

name: S
caption: Sum of ordering and review costs
message: The sum of ordering and review costs must be positive.

name: h
caption: Unit holding cost per unit of time
message: The unit holding cost per unit of time must be positive.

name: Pi
caption: Backorder cost per unit short
message: The backorder cost per unit short must be positive.

name: Pi0
caption: Unit marginal profit
message: The unit marginal profit must be non-negative.

name: beta
caption: Fraction of shortages backordered
message: The fraction of shortage backordered must be in the interval [0, 1].

name: value
caption: Demand dist. over one unit of time
message: Select a demand distribution value from the list
